'CLINICAL STUDY DESIGN', '6.1', 'Clinical study design', '<Clinical study design>', 'This is a multi-center, randomized, open-label, parallel-group comparison study to assess the', 'reduction in treatment burden during the administration of a DPP-4 inhibitor (trelagliptin or a daily', 'DPP-4 inhibitor) for 12 weeks in patients with type 2 diabetes on diet and exercise therapy only.', 'Eligible study subjects as a result of eligibility assessment after giving informed consent will be', 'randomized to either of the study drug (trelagliptin) group or the comparative drug (daily
